name: Planet Graveyard
description:
Planet Graveyard is a short existential horror game based on a dream. It takes inspiration from LSD Dream Emulator and was originaly created for the LSD Jam 2022.

Explore bizarre and seemigly lifeless planet that looks like giant graveyard. Find out what actually happened to this world by interacting with different sights, scattered around. You are free to leave this planet whenever you want.

Content Warning:

This game is heavily focused on topic of death and takes great influence from russian school of existential philosohy and also features some coarse language.

Approximate playtime ~20 minutes.

DEV NOTE: We've updated the game, by adding a small hint system.
